None.Name: Ice Shard
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, tower hurls an icy shard that deals 72 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 110 in total.

None.Name: Frost Wave
None.Description: Freezes up to 4 units in target area for 10 seconds. After freeze wears off, targets are immune against Freeze for a while. Reusable every 30 seconds.
